main_topic.author: Chris Deotte
main_topic.title: [FIXED] - All Games Are Failing
main_topic.content:
I noticed that beginning on May 28th around 23:00 UTC, all games have been failing. When we view games on the LB or inside our personal submissions page, we see all teams received NAN points and if we click to review the game, we get the error message: Unable to load episode replay: 54897616

[@addisonhoward](https://www.kaggle.com/addisonhoward)

UPDATE: Fixed on May 29th around 4:00 UTC

comments.author: Develra
comments.content: Thanks for reporting - we are investigating.

comments.author: AAElter
comments.content: I submitted 3 submissions and they are still "submitting", hanging there for about 12 hours, without coming to an end as a succeeded or failed submission.
comments.date: Posted 2 months ago  ·  589th in this Competition

reply.author: Bovard Doerschuk-Tiberi
reply.content: This should be resolved in the next 6 hours or so as the servers work through the backlog of episodes
